entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:26 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -46.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 7:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -46.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -50.5°C
Wind: NNE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 49.
entry.summary: Clear. Ice fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 49. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 62 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 40.
entry.summary: Sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 40. Wind chill minus 65 in the morning and minus 56 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
